ace.skill: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nam at laoreet dui. Nam eu ullamcorper lacus, ac pulvinar sem. Orci varius natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. Proin aliquet ante nunc, eget blandit eros mattis ut.

active.name: Starlight Amplification III
active.text: [Power-Up] Increases the attack power by 12.5 / 15.625 / 18.75 / 21.875 / 25% and critical rate by 12.5 / 15.625 / 18.75 / 21.875 / 25% . (Accumulates up to 3 times)

passive1.name: Traversing Starlight II
passive1.text: Increases the critical damage by 4 / 8 / 12 / 16 / 20% and penetration by 4 / 8 / 12 / 16 / 20% of the allies within the vertical line.

passive2.name: Luminant Starlight
passive2.text: Decreases the enemy team's action speed by 6 / 12 / 18 / 24 / 30% and critical resistance by 3 / 6 / 9 / 12 / 15% for 3 min. when being attacked.

passive3.name: Spreading Starlight II
passive3.text: Increases the MAX HP by 3 / 6 / 9 / 12 / 15% and critical damage resistance by 3 / 6 / 9 / 12 / 15%, and decreases the incoming damage by 3 / 6 / 9 / 12 / 15% of the allies within the position.
effects: within position critcal damage resistance up
within position decreases incoming damage up
passive3.finalTechnique: Decreases the incoming damage by 15% for 5 min. (Cooldown: 15 minutes) (Available after 2 minutes) (Up to 2 times)​
